# 2020前端工程师必读手册

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/x2020-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/x2020-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install x2020-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce
x2020-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xerlingerling-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce
xerlingerling-qianduan-gongchengshi-bidu-shouce <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
